page.title: 03ABERGELE INFANTS SCHOOL
page.content: English speaking children in Abergele attend the Infants' School between the ages of three and seven years. There are 208 pupils on the school roll, with 3 nursery asistants, 6 full time teachers and 1 part-time teacher. There are two half-day nursery classes for the 3 and 4 year olds, two classes for the 5 year olds, one for the 6 year olds and two classes of 7 year olds. The school moved to its present building from the old Church in Wales school building in 1950. The morning session is from 9 am to 12 noon. Children may go home at mid-day or stay for a school meal or sandwiches when they are supervised by three mid-day supervisors. The afternoon session is from 1 pm to 3 pm The head teacher is Mrs.V.E.Williams. The school uniform is red and grey.
